response.overview: Andreas Bethmann brings us another slice of prime exploitation! Stuck on a prison island, Two young woman are subjected to rape and torture, but when they escape into the jungle with the help of the camps female doctor, the nightmare continues! German with English Subtitles. All special effects were made by Olaf Ittenbach (director of Burning Moon and Dard Divorce)
response.title: Prison Of Hell: K3
